anya-e0605n0:4_0: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n0:5_0: Patvā bodhiṁ visuddhaṁ sakalaguṇadadaṁ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n0:6_0: Katvā dukkhassa antaṁ katasubhajanataṁ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n0:9_0: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṁ uvimhaṁ suvipulamamalaṁ bodhisambhārabhūtaṁ,
anya-e0605n0:10_0: Hetuṁ hetvānurūpaṁ sugatagataphalaṁ bhāsato me suṇātha.
